Brief Summary:
The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of GDPT regiment (gemcitabineï¼Œcisplatin,Prednisone ,Thalidomide

) for patients with Peripheral T-cell lymphoma.
Primary Outcome Measures: Progression-free Survival, up to end of follow-up-phase (approximately 24 months)
Secondary Outcome Measures: Response Rate, 21 days(3 weeks) for one cycle,Efficacy was evaluated every two cycles, every 6 weeks,up to completion of treatment(approximately 18 weeks )|Overall Survival, up to the date of death (approximately 5 years)|Median Survival Time, 24 months
Study Design: Allocation: RANDOMIZED|Intervention Model: PARALLEL|Masking: NONE|Primary Purpose: TREATMENT
Locations: Oncology Department of The First Affiliated Hospital of Zhengzhou University, Zhengzhou, Henan, 450052, China
